name: table
description:
Builds a table in a CFML page. Use the cfcol tag to define table column and row
characteristics. The cftable tag renders data either as preformatted text, or, with the HTMLTable
attribute, as an HTML table. Use cftable to create tables if you don't want to write HTML table tag
code, or if your data can be well presented as preformatted text.

params.name: query
params.description: Name of the cfquery from which to draw data.

params.name: maxrows
params.description: Maximum number of rows to display in the table.

params.name: colspacing
params.description: Number of spaces to insert between columns 'default is 2'.

params.name: headerlines
params.description:
Number of lines to use for the table header. The default is 2, which leaves one line between
the headers and the first row of the table.

params.name: htmltable
params.description: Renders the table as an HTML 3.0 table.

params.name: border
params.description: Adds a border to the table. Use only when you specify the HTMLTable attribute for the table.

params.name: colheaders
params.description: Displays headers for each column, as specified in the cfcol tag.

params.name: startrow
params.description: Specifies the query row from which to start processing.
